amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities of the Second Class and Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Streets; improvement; railways; duty to pave between rails.
amendatorysection.para: Any street or other railway company, occupying with any track any street, avenue or alley or portion thereof, which may be ordered paved, repaved, macadamized or graveled, may be charged with the expense of such improvement of said portion of such street, avenue or alley so occupied by it between its tracks, between its rails and for one foot beyond the outer rails; and the cost thereof may be collected and enforced against such company in such manner as may be provided by ordinance; or the mayor and council or board of trustees may by ordinance require such company to pave, repave, macadamize or gravel such portion of such street, avenue or alley occupied by said tracks and for one foot beyond its outside rails.
